quest.name: Leader to Leader
journal:
Trna's shoulders are thrown back and her stance is braced. Her normally jovial gaze looks steeled for trouble.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Trna relates that the new meyhane is a hit with the locals, putting so many adventuring types at her disposal that she now receives direct requests from the Radiant Host itself. Perhaps predictably, Ghasa interrupts this good news with reports of a gaggle of Gajasura heading straight for Svarna, so she asks you to extend an adventurer's welcome to Acala's cohorts. While she doesn't yet explain her reasons, Trna leaves you with one, immovable condition: whatever fighting occurs must not end in tragedy.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
You give your Gajasura guests the warmest welcome that will allow you to leave the confrontation unscathed. They will hopefully remain subdued for some time, allowing you to regroup with Trna.

When you arrive, Ogul has her weapon drawn and tensions are running high. Acala demands that the Hippo Riders forfeit Svarna and leave immediately. Trna retorts that Acala and his people should join the Riders instead of fighting them. Unable to reconcile their differences, Trna finally starts speaking Acala's language when she challenges him, leader to leader, to a race on hippo carts across a predetermined stretch of the island. Acala, confident in his abilities, accepts and heads directly to the starting line at Yedlihmad.

Trna immediately regrets challenging Acala to a race, fearing it will besmirch the Riders' hard-earned reputation. You assuage her concern by suggesting that the race be held as an official, public festivity. Citizens from across Thavnair are invited to witness the landmark competition between the Arkasodara and Gajasura, the first of its kind on the island─or, perhaps, anywhere. Bolstered by your reassurance, Trna bids you accompany her as she negotiates terms of engagement with Acala.

Since the outcome of the race will affect the lives of many, Trna offers Acala the option of drawing upon his battle brothers' strength during the race. Acala rebuffs her, insisting that he, and he alone, is strong enough to win. Trna, on the other hand, decides to rely upon not only her associates' guidance, but yours. She pulls you aside to share her strategy.

Trna explains her plan: Maru and Ghasa will keep you updated on the race's progress from key locations along the track, and you will use their intel to coach Trna as she rides. Additionally, Maru offers some colorful ingenuity to draw out the full extent of Saurya's enthusiasm when the time is right. Linkpearl in ear, you set off for the finish line by the Giantsgall Grounds and wait for history to begin...

Thanks to your advice and Trna's undeniable skill with a cart, she secures victory by a hippo's nose. Instead of lording her win over the frustrated Acala, however, Trna instead entreats him once more to join her. Besieged by a heartfelt speech and his own sense of duty towards his brothers, Acala accepts, and you extend to Trna your congratulations.

While the Hippo Riders were shocked by the Gajasura addition to their family, Trna says she was able to smooth things over with her associates. She has a racing gate installed in Svarna to commemorate the legendary race between her and Acala, with ambitions to hold more in the future. Your heart is filled with ever higher hopes for Trna and all her associates, old and new, as you continue to rebuild a thriving Thavnair.
objectives: Survey your surroundings and defeat any enemies that might appear.
Stand by at the finish line.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Forename, am I glad to see you! Haven't made much headway on our Gajasura problem, but let me tell you about the rest of it.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Like I said, no tearful reconciliation or nothin', but havin' folks at the meyhane's been givin' us peace of mind. Between our little outfit an' Kancana's contacts, we've got every sort of adventurer you could ever need.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Ogul's been stoppin' by when she can, too. She's gotten mighty good at ridin'. I think she's got the instincts of a racer...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Once Ogul finds her groove, she's unstoppable!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: As a fellow adventurer, she makes me proud.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: If you say so...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: There's no doubt she's been settin' a great example for our recruits.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: So much so that even the Radiant Host's been askin' us for guards an' lookouts to patrol the roads.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Works out in our favor, seein' as we'll be the first to know if Acala ever decides to─

dialogue.name: GHASA
dialogue.text: (-???-)B-Boss! Boss!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Right on cue...

dialogue.name: GHASA
dialogue.text: We just got word─a whole mob of Gajasura's closin' in on us. An' I don't think it's 'cause they got wind of our deal on lassis or nothin', neither.

dialogue.name: GHASA
dialogue.text: They'll be here any moment, Boss. What do we do!?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Ghasa, go and find Ogul at Palaka's Stand an' have her report here. Then, I want you to make the rounds and tell folks in this area to be on the alert. I've got a hunch Acala's only after us, but just to be safe.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Maru, I want you to keep up your maintenance on the carts. No need to panic, but if matters should run awry, I want everyone ready to leave, understand?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'm goin' to relay the situation to our friends at the meyhane. As for you, Forename, I'd like you to go an' graciously welcome our Gajasura guests.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Any fights picked with you, you've got my permission to finish. But I don't want no blood on your hands. Don't mean to make things complicated, but that's how it's gotta be.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'll owe you one. Report back when you've a handle on things, yeah?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I sent off some extra fighters, but I'd like you to go an' make sure nothin' gets out of hand. Nothin' permanent, remember!

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: Ghasa apprised me of the s-situation─I came as quickly as I c-could!

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: I'm g-glad I made it in time, but t-to think a whole horde of bloodthirsty G-Gajasura may not be far behind... <shudder>

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Bhaaa-ha-ha-haaa! Your home, conquest for Acala!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Welcome back. As you can see, we're at a bit of a deadlock with our favorite hippo enthusiast here.

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: Th-This is hardly the time to be glib, Trna. B-But rest assured that I am prepared to do all that is necessary in s-self-defense─even if that should be a swift and decisive o-offense!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Hold on a moment.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'm angry, Ogul. When I think about what Acala's stolen and who he's hurt, I start boilin' like afternoon soup. But skewerin' him ain't gonna solve the bigger issue.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I say we talk, first. See if we ain't so different after all.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: You too weak for Acala! Leave! Leave hippos, go!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You want us to leave Svarna? That ain't an option, an' you know that.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: But if you've got such a hankerin' for our hippo carts, there is another way─you could always join us.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Me an' my associates─me an' my people─we built this place to welcome us when nowhere else would. So there ain't no version of this where we simply up an' leave 'cause you demand it.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: But you know exactly what I'm talkin' about, don't you? You know what it's like to have no place to welcome you. To need to take care of your people, no matter what. That's why I don't wanna fight you.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Your people no place for home? But you protect people... You...same as Acala?

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: But Acala hit your people! Tell truth─you forgive no Acala!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Like I said, I'm angry. No one messes with my family and gets away with it. That's why I wanna settle things with you, leader to leader. Fair an' square.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Bhaaa-ha-ha-ha! Acala hit stronger than weak you! Acala win!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Sure keen on violence, ain't you? When I say “settle things,” I'm not talkin' about a fight─I'm talkin' about a race. On hippo carts!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: If I lose, I swear on my honor as a racer that I'll agree to your terms. But if I win, you repent for what you've done...and you join us. Peaceably. Deal?

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: You, fool! Acala win race, take hippos, take wagons!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: You can try. We'll start the race from that harbor town right there, an' ride the highroad all the way up past the quarry further on.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Agree. Acala wait at town. But Acala wait not long!

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: W-Well, he was more reasonable than I expected. But lest he decide to perpetrate any knavery, I shall keep a sharp eye over him!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I ain't gonna go back on what I said, but I really shouldn't have called Acala out like that...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Not 'cause I think I'll lose─not on your life! But we had to crawl our way up from bein' nothin' but reckless misfits, and now that we've made somethin' of ourselves, I'm gonna ride the highroad an' blow whatever respect we earned to the wind...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: What's done is done, I guess. Now we just gotta focus on keepin' things fair. Don't want Acala workin' a traverse around us, not when everyone's futures are at stake.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Damn it all... How're we supposed to make this work?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: What if the race were a sanctioned event?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Invite a crowd to watch. Acala's not likely to work anything then.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: That's genius, Forename! An official hippo race between the Arkasodara and Gajasura... That'd be, well, legendary!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: If we do that, not only do we stay legitimate, but we'd be hostin' an event that everyone can enjoy─like a festival!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I know I said our racin' days were over, but this is goin' to be one for the chronicles, Forename. I'll show you a race you'll never forget!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright. I'll have Ogul smooth things over with the Radiant Host while my associates spread the word about our upcomin' scurry! Come an' meet me in Yedlihmad─can't keep Acala waitin' too long.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Ogul said the Radiant Host was a little perplexed, but they gave us their blessin' nonetheless! Better to settle our differences peacefully, in their words.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: My associates are out gatherin' the locals, so let's talk terms with Acala while we can.

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: Leave supervising Acala to me! Rest assured, I shall not be fainting any time soon─mind over matter, as Grandmother would say. Mind over matter!

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: You not ready? Acala ready. Acala no patience!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Keep your armor on. We've gotta wait for our audience to show up. Don't wanna start without our kinsfolk cheerin' us on, now do we?

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Kins? Race, battle. Not show off! No kins!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: C'mon, Acala─our “kins” are goin' to make sure both sides play fair. Besides, if you win, they'll officially be your kins, right?

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: ...Fine. Acala accept kins.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Speakin' of which, I've got a proposition for you─seein' as this race is gonna determine the future of both our peoples, I'd like to declare it a cooperative effort.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Only the two of us'll be ridin' the track, of course, but my team's gonna be backin' me up from the sidelines. You're welcome to do the same, if you'd like.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Hmph! Battle, Acala win alone! Acala strong!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Is that so. Alright then.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Forename! Let's talk.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Where kins!? Acala ready to win!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I think it goes without sayin' that this race ain't just about the Hippo Riders. The whole island─and all the people on it─are countin' on us to win this.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: So here's my plan─I'm gonna give you a linkpearl, like the ones me an' my associates use. That way we can be in contact durin' the race.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'll have Maru and Ghasa standin' by at key points along the track so that they can give you updates on our progress.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I want you to use that information to advise me durin' the race. Sound okay?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Not to lay on the pressure, or anythin'. I take full responsibility for how I ride, but just in case I lose my head, I want you to keep me focused.

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Chief Strategist, reporting for duty!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I think I already lost my head somewhere... But I'll do my best.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Oh, if you insist.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thanks, pal. I'm countin' on you.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: All that's left is gettin' Saurya ready to run. Then there ain't nothin' stoppin' us.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: She likes those bright colors... What do you reckon the chances are of a rainbow conveniently poppin' out of nowhere, eh? If only...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Hah...hah... I m-made it! Boss, I─ <wheeze>

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Maru! What're you doin' here? And sweatin' like Ogul in that gaja head. What happened? What's the matter?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: N-Nothin', Boss. I brought you somethin' for your race...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Saurya goes wild for bright colors, right? So I used some of our leftover gulal to make a rainbow! Just throw this, and she'll perk right up for sure...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: If this ain't a sign from the divinities, I don't know what is. Maru, you hamsahead, you really came through! We're gonna win this thanks to you!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I'll save this for just the right moment. Can't hit the ground runnin' too hard after all.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Keep that in mind when you're coachin' me. Pacin' is important for a race this long. Anyway, go on ahead to the goalpost over by the Giantsgall Grounds. I'll see you when I bring home a victory!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Maru, I want you watchin' the highroad around the Great Work. I'll fill you in on the details by linkpearl.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Even after all this time, I always get nervous before a race. But all I've gotta do is trust myself, trust my girl, an' ride!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Wait for me by the goalpost─Racashir's goin' to be callin' the race, so he should be there by now too.

dialogue.name: RACASHIR
dialogue.text: I really hope Trna wins the race...

dialogue.name: RACASHIR
dialogue.text: From what teacher says, if the Gajasura end up taking over Thavnair, we're all in trouble.

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: Ghhhnnnnnn! I sh-shan't be intimidated! I have cast all f-fear from my body now! Th-This time for certain!

dialogue.name: RACASHIR
dialogue.text: Teacher, we're all ready over here.

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: It seems that preparations at the goalpost are complete. Racers, are you ready?

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text:
Citizens of Thavnair─I welcome you to the very first Hannish Hippo Hustle!
Representing the Arkasodara and our very own Hippo Riders...Trna!!!
Representing the Gajasura, the mighty...Acala!!!
Racers, take your mark!

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: Get set!

dialogue.name: OGUL
dialogue.text: GO!!!

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Acala win! Run, run! Conquest for Acala!

dialogue.name: GHASA
dialogue.text: (-Ghasa's Voice-)That Gajasura bastard! Pushin' our precious hippo that hard─I'm so mad, I'm sweatin' blood!

dialogue.name: GHASA
dialogue.text: (-Ghasa's Voice-)The boss's eatin' dust, but the road's not lookin' too good up ahead... What's your call!?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Don't lose to that bastard! Full speed ahead!

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Save your strength! The road's lookin' rocky.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: A-Alright!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Ain't no good, the road's a mess. Sorry, but I'm gonna hang back for now!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Right! We'll hold fast!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: (-Maru's Voice-)They're passin' by the Great Work, an' it looks like Acala's hippo might be reachin' its limit. Not surprisin', seein' how hard he's pushin' it...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: (-Maru's Voice-)Chances are good Acala's not goin' to take much more of a lead, but it's your call...

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Go, Trna! Hippos are go!

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Hold steady till the final spurt!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Ain't gotta tell me twice! C'mon, Saurya, let's show him what we've got!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Loud an' clear. We'll bide our time for a grand finish!

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: You! Fast, more fast! Run, run, run!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The two hippo carts are hurtling towards the goal at breakneck speed! Give your final piece of advice to Trna for the win!

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Boss! Give it everythin' you've got.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Unleash the rainbow!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Hya-haaah! Been waitin' for this! Get ready to see lightnin'!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Saurya, let's go!

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Who won? Who was it!?

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Acala win!?

dialogue.name: RACASHIR
dialogue.text: By a hippo's nose, the victor of the Hannish Hippo Hustle is...TRNA!!!

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Acala lose... Why!? You trick Acala!?

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: No, we didn't trick you. We just know our hippos, that's all. What they like. How much they can take.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Hippos are livin', breathin' creatures, same as us. Havin' to run that hard, for that long─all while pullin' a heavy bloke like you? No mystery why your hippo melted its grease.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Hippo slow because grease melt... Acala understand.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: And I did say that your people could support you durin' the race. But you insisted on ridin' alone. They're your “battle brothers,” ain't they? I bet they would've loved to help.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: I might be in charge, but if I've gotta rely on others to protect my people, I'm not hesitatin'. You can only do so much by yourself.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: By...yourself...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Of course, trustin' folks enough to do that didn't exactly come naturally to me neither.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Me and my people, we used to be nothin' but a bunch of misfits. We didn't really belong nowhere, an' no one really wanted us around in the first place.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: People like us ain't got a lot of options─you either scrape by on the outskirts so that you ain't a bother, or leave for someplace new an' hope that you can prove yourself somehow.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: But it ain't gotta be like that. You can be you an' still build trust an' contribute somethin' positive, however small. Misfit or no, at some point you realize that none of us are really so different.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: So I believe in you, Acala. I think if no-good racers like us can turn things around, you an' your people can too. You ain't gotta conquer nothin' to protect your brothers now.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: A deal's a deal, right? Join us. Become a Hippo Rider an' see where the cart takes you.

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Acala your words understand. Acala, you, not different. But Acala Gajasura. This bad...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Our tribes may have their differences, but as for you an' me...that's just a racin' rivalry now. An' everyone watchin' saw how hard you were tryin' for your people. Might take some time, but I think you'll find a place here.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: So, what do you say? Come back with us to Svarna?

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Acala...accept...

dialogue.name: ACALA
dialogue.text: Acala lose race... Sad. But for battle brothers, new home. Acala protect brothers. So Acala glad. Much glad.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Thanks for the stellar advice! Couldn't have done it without you.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Ain't no way I was losin', but I'm glad this didn't end with Acala's people bein' chased off the island.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: It got a little tense when a bunch of Gajasura came walkin' in, bold as brass, but I explained the situation an' everyone's bein' good-hearted about it. It's like I said─none of us are so different.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: But enough about that─people loved the race! When was the last time I rode like that!? Wind against my face, crowds cheerin' me on... Heh, now that I think about it? Might've been a first.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Next time the Hannish Hippo Hustle rolls around, we should start it from Svarna. Or finish it. Or both! Think of the traffic we'd get at the meyhane...

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Who knew thinkin' up new ways to excite other folks would be so...well, excitin'? This─all of this─is thanks to you, Forename. I can't thank you enough.

dialogue.name: TRNA
dialogue.text: Alright, let's get to it! Our brand-new racin' gate ain't gonna build itself, after all!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In commemoration of the historic race between the representatives of the Arkasodara and Gajasura peoples─and the peace thereby achieved─a gate has been erected in Svarna!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Hippo Riders' reputation has soared to legendary heights. Backed by their diligence and hard-earned skills, Trna and her associates will continue to spread joy throughout all of Thavnair!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Sworn reputation with the Hippo Riders.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the Arkasodara tribal daily quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Ghanta.
